entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
